title: bots taking over aram... again...
body: been playing a fair bit of aram again and its still full of bots the few games ive played the last few days have all had atleast 1 bot in them the one i played this morning the other team had 3 bots and we had 1... makes me not want to play the game mode at all due to the fact theres so many bots and can end up on a team with no chance of winning seems really unfair...
